Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/47th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood & Lake Shore Dr: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
